programme.desc: The ladies' L.A adventures continue. Elka's quest for the movie star of her dreams results in a surprise meeting.

programme.title: Humor Me
programme.desc: Desolate, broke and unable to pay the rent, Nate begrudgingly moves in with his widowed father, Bob (Elliott Gould), in his New Jersey retirement golf community. Bob, always quick with a joke, uses humor to deal with all of life's challenges, even the death of his beloved wife. It drives Nate crazy. Thinking his son could benefit from some discipline, Bob sends Nate to work for Ellis (Willie Carpenter) an older ex-Marine who runs operations at the community. While at work, Nate stumbles on a senior citizen theater troupe staging a musical. Nate agrees to help but quickly realises it won't be easy to get these quirky women to cooperate.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: Home & Alone for Christmas
programme.desc: It’s holiday season and there really is no place like home, unless you are the Taylors. In a bid to reconnect with his family, Martin Taylor intervenes with an experiment and disconnects his home from all power! Now with all distractions aside, will the family be able to bond again or is this a recipe for utter disaster! This madly entertaining comedy is perfect for all the family - a must see!

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: Pup Star is back and bigger than ever as the hit singing-pup competition show goes global! After achieving international stardom, Tiny the adorable Yorkie joins the celebrity judges for the first-ever Pup Star World Tour. The judges each welcome their favourite contestant from around the world to the Pup Star pack, training them to compete for the new title of global pup star champion. India's Raji joins Team Growl, China's Ming joins Team Paw-Paw, Nigeria's Mobo joins Team Gnarley, and Mexico's dashing telenovela star Julio joins Team Tiny.

programme.title: Wonder Women S1E2 Japan
programme.desc: For centuries, the Ama free divers of Japan have plunged into icy waters to depths of 50 feet without air tanks to retrieve shellfish to feed their families. But today, a pair of women in their eighties are among the last practitioners of this endangered tradition.

programme.title: Wonder Women S1E3 Brazil

programme.title: The Plastic Whales of Amsterdam
programme.desc: We're all aware that we need to reuse our plastic, but one entrepreneur took it to the extreme. When the Amsterdam canals were becoming too clogged with plastic, Marius Smit founded the Plastic Whale, a boat made out of plastic with the sole purpose of fishing for more.

programme.title: Shifting Ice + Changing Tides
programme.desc: ‘Shifting Ice and Changing Tides’ is a human and wind powered, female led, ski and sail expedition to the west coast of Greenland. In this remote, fascinating and beautiful region, six women will explore and ski first descents while limiting their environmental footprint by sailing and climbing.

programme.title: Nation On Fire
programme.desc: Kyiv, the Ukrainian capital, has been gripped by unrest in recent times. This is a unique portrait of a nation in suspense, a nation in fear, a nation in waiting. A rare and exclusive snapshot of the days after the riots but before the storm.

programme.title: Wadjemup : Black Prison White Playground
programme.desc: Black Prison White Playground. Wadjemup/Rottnest Island. A beautiful place that is culturally and spiritually significant to Aboriginal people. And also a site where gross harm took place and hundreds of Aboriginal men are buried in unmarked graves.

programme.title: Letters to our Children: Stories of Refuge
programme.desc: A group of immigrant and refugee mothers from 10 different countries and speaking different languages create a book of illustrations showcasing heartfelt letters to their children as a way to explain what brought them to Winnipeg, Canada and what they hope their lives will be like. This film follows the women’s incredible journey as they find a way to pass their stories to their children.

programme.title: Galahad
programme.desc: On the 8th June 1982, at the height of the Falklands War, 53 men lost their lives and hundreds were injured in Argentine air attacks on British ships Sir Galahad and Sir Tristram. 32 of those men were Welsh Guards - some of them no more than boys.

programme.title: Data Mining The Deceased
programme.desc: More than half of North Americans are fascinated by genealogy. Some gain a sense of identity by uncovering their ancestors, their culture, and their country of origin. Others find it disorienting when they discover that their history differs from what they have always believed. But there is another side to the rise in genealogy that goes beyond human interest. It is arguably the largest historical enterprise in the world, driven by big religion, big business and big technology.

programme.title: 281 Days
programme.desc: In March 2007, Dutch adventurist Ralph Tuijn attempted to become the first person to row solo across the Pacific Ocean unassisted. Departing from Callao Peru, and leaving his wife and daughter behind for more than nine months, Ralph faced the effects of La Nina, a broken water-maker, and rotten food provisions – leaving him with little or no food or fresh water in the middle of the Pacific Ocean

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: Luke Nguyens Food Trail - Saigon, Vietnam Part 1
programme.desc: With Luke’s busy life it’s important to find the work-life balance. Devoting Sunday as a family day, he explores the outdoors and the variety of restaurants Saigon has to offer. He cooks up several dishes and entertains his friend with a dinner party favourite of banh xeo.

programme.title: Luke Nguyens Food Trail - Hong Kong Part1
programme.desc: Inspired by his Hakka Heritage tracing back to Hong Kong, Luke wanted to influence Vietnamese cuisine in Hong Kong by combining flavours from all over Vietnam.

programme.title: Goshen
programme.desc: ‘Goshen – Places of Refuge for the Running People’ is a powerful documentary depicting the diet and active lifestyle of the indigenous Tarahumara, a light-footed running tribe, who are striving to maintain their ancient culture against all odds.

programme.title: Isabela
programme.desc: A darker look at paradise in the Galapagos archipelago. Environmental artist and world traveller Billy Strong and Filmmaker / Photographer Dell Cullum, both from East Hampton, New York take an unauthorized journey and expedition onto never before landed locations of the Galapagos, to show the devastating effects of ocean-borne trash and debris on it’s shorelines.

programme.title: Kangaroo Island, Road Trip, Winton
programme.desc: Discover together Kangaroo Island, Road Trip and Winton.

programme.title: Wildlife Warriors, Classic Cars
programme.desc: From the wildlife conservation projects at Dreamworld to the rejuvenated Star on the Gold Coast. Also the superb motor vehicles of the Gosford Classic Car Museum.

programme.title: Ice Trap
programme.desc: This voyage to the centre of the ice is the breath-taking tale of a polar scuba diving expedition in Greenland. August 2012. It’s the end of the Arctic summer. Two adventurers are drifting in their sea kayaks among gigantic blocks of ice carried south by the East Greenland Current. They intend to travel between the only two communities on one of the world’s wildest coastlines. Ittoqqortoormiit is the starting point of an intense 1000-kilometer-long human adventure!

programme.title: A Simpler Way : Crisis As Opportunity
programme.desc: A feature-length documentary that follows a community in Australia who came together to explore and demonstrate a simpler way to live in response to global crises.

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: Al Murray - One Man, One Guvnor
programme.desc: The Pub Landlord is back to save the nation, in this, his latest stand-up extravaganza, because he knows what the country really needs right now is some bloke waving a pint around offering common sense solutions. Join the Guv as he sets out the manifesto for his Guv'norment, sorts out the world's financial system and fixes the NHS, all while pulling the perfectly poured pint. So charge your glasses (remember, pint for the fella, glass of white wine or fruit based drink for the lady) and join The Pub Landlord in celebrating 20 years at the lager top in this brand new stand up show.

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

Join the Guv as he sets out the manifesto for his Guv'norment, sorts out the world's financial system and fixes the NHS, all while pulling the perfectly poured pint. programme.title: It Takes a Thief
programme.desc: Burglarized twice in the house which they've lived in since 1973, Suzanne and her 30-something twin daughters feel vulnerable in the precious home, particularly with the absence of any male figure. Bring in the ex-burglars for their first step to safety!

programme.title: Dr Death: Harold Shipman
programme.desc: Britain’s biggest serial killer was a doctor, Dr Harold Shipman. Unsuspected for many years, Dr. Shipman selected his victims from his patient list. There were clues, but who in the community would believe that a doctor would kill his patients? Suspected of killing over 350 people during his career, it was clumsy attempts at forging the will of one of his victims in his own favour that alerted the police and led to his arrest. Found guilty at his trial and jailed for life, Dr Shipman committed suicide never accepting his guilt.

programme.title: Turtles & Hares
programme.desc: Not all heroes wear capes and in David Carrie’s case, his hero’s clothing of choice is a pair of running shorts. Postman by day and Running Guru by night, David Carrie is a former Irish international athlete who has turned the small country town in which he lives into the undisputed Marathon Capital of Ireland, with a population of only 1,800 and yet almost 1,000 Dublin Marathon finishers. This one-hour documentary is not just about running or about completing a marathon – it is about a movement of mind, passion, hope and spirit – all captured through the eyes and lives of the leaders & members of Team Carrie over the course of 6 months. Ever wished you could run a marathon? Welcome to Team Carrie’s world – we’ll see you at the start line. Official Selection FICTS 2019.

programme.title: The First Great Escape
programme.desc: The extraordinary and little known story of 29 prisoners who escaped from a POW camp in Holzminden Germany during WW1, a feat that inspired The Great Escape years later.

programme.title: Cleopatra: Portrait of a Killer
programme.desc: Cleopatra, the Last Pharaoh of Egypt, has come down to us as a lover, a seductress and a ruler of cunning and guile. In Ephesus, 1000 miles from Cleopatra’s Egypt, a skeleton has been found in a remarkable tomb. After a ground-breaking forensic investigation, leading archaeologists have proof that the body is a murder victim… they believe they have discovered the skeleton of Cleopatra’s sister – murdered by Cleopatra and Mark Antony.

programme.title: Aliens: Are We Alone?
programme.desc: Does alien life exist out there in the Universe? Scientists are now getting closer than ever to answering that question thanks to the Kepler Space Telescope. This revolutionary spacecraft is on a mission to find habitable alien planets. Thanks to Kepler, we now know of thousands of possible planets and we’re getting closer than ever to finding the holy grail: a twin of our Earth. We use CGI to bring these alien worlds to life, and with the help of scientists, we speculate on what extra-terrestrial life might be like.

programme.title: James Bond: For Our Eyes Only
programme.desc: In 1953, James Bond first emerged as a character in Ian Fleming's novel ‘Casino Royale’, and just nine years later the spy was the protagonist in the film ‘Dr. No’ – thus starting one of the longest and most successful franchises in the history of cinema. Beautiful women, exhilarating stunts, breath-taking locales and the charm of a handsome English secret agent have formed the essential ingredients of all Bond films. Recount and relive all of 007’s menacing missions, from the first feature film production in 1962 to the highly anticipated ‘No Time To Die’.

programme.title: The Ario Dream
programme.desc: Renowned filmmaker Paul Diffley has brought his technical skills to the caving world, with his new film The Ario Dream. The film profiles the exploration of the deep caves of Ario in the Picos de Europa mountains, Northern Spain. The film follows the latest 2016/17 expeditions as they try to make the last few connections that could result in the deepest cave system in Europe. This is a gripping account of ‘expedition-style’ cave exploration involving underground camps and complex logistics, and where the penalties for unforeseen emergencies or problems are severe. At the apex of the operation are the cave divers, pushing into the unknown in deep sumps where rescue is not an option. The tension, as each diver disappears into the blackness, is genuine… People's Choice Award - Kendal Mountain Film Festival 2017.

programme.title: Red Sea Jaws
programme.desc: This chilling documentary investigates the December 2010 shark attacks in the resort of Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, which left one tourist dead and four others seriously injured.

programme.title: Lodging With Lions
programme.desc: A new influx of volunteers arrives at Antelope Park and Dan, the volunteer manager, takes them through the dos and don’ts of walking with lions.

programme.title: Lodging With Lions
programme.desc: A devastating poaching incident is discovered during a snare sweep. A bush fire runs wild as the volunteers fight to control it.

programme.title: Magic of Nature
programme.desc: Invertebrates show off ways in which they defend themselves, find food and move from place to place.

programme.title: Dino Bird
programme.desc: In Australia's oldest rainforest Cooper Valley is the Cassowary, a giant, flightless, prehistoric bird.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George visits the vanishing island of Tuvalu in the South Pacific and explores major ocean storms.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George explores the now brutal Australian summer and imbeds with the firefighters battling huge bush fires.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika Vaz explores the desert habitat with wildlife biologist, Dr. Suthirtha Dutta, in the hope that they can focus attention on the urgent need to save the great Indian bustard.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika Vaz goes in search of the purple frog with scientist Dr. Kathikeyan Vasudevan to understand how a creature so small can help explain 130 million years of evolution.

programme.title: Walking With Elephants
programme.desc: This film is about the environmental and human impact on the elephants of Africa today while they face impending extinction within 30 years, if measures are not taken to protect them.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika Vaz joins hands with biologist Tiasa Adhya to film fishing cats in the wild, in the hope that they can show the community how resilient and important their closest wild neighbour is.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika travels across critical tiger reserves in search of an answer, how do you find a balance between creating space for tigers and accommodating the needs of communities that live alongside them?

programme.title: The American Tiger
programme.desc: This film explores America’s captive tiger trade, where more are privately owned than in the wild.

programme.title: Gorilla Doctors
programme.desc: Dr. Mike Cranfield and the gorilla doctors perform check-ups, give medicine to and sometime operate on Africa's endangered mountain gorillas.

programme.title: Magic of Nature
programme.desc: How different animal species procreate and how they have adapted to live in certain environments.

programme.title: Cooking Clean with DeAndre Jordan
programme.desc: On this Episode of Cooking Clean with DeAndre Jordan, he'll be learning to make tacos with a caribbean twist. DeAndre will be joined by both Chef Shelly Flash and Junior Chef Shannen Hosman. The trio will prepare vegan double-decker jerk tacos.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali's Greatest Rivals
programme.desc: PlayersTV celebrates Muhammad Ali's career and legacy

programme.title: Fight Stars: Deontay WIlder
programme.desc: Heavyweight wild man Deontay Wilder finds a heartfelt connection with foe Luis Ortiz. Former world champion boxer Miguel Cotto makes an emotional farewell to the sport. programme.desc: From lush green forests to snow-capped mountains, from towering cliffs to bare sandbars, the Greek islands are a land of unmatched natural beauty. On the ground olive-farmers, monks, shepherds, ferrymen and sculptors - ordinary people living in exceptional places - give original insights into historical buildings, sacred places and, last not least, culinary traditions that have affected Europe for centuries.

programme.title: Gallowwalkers
programme.desc: A supernatural western following Aman, a mysterious gunman, the son of a nun cursed by God to be haunted by all those who die by his hand. When Aman kills a gang of murderers out of revenge, the crew rises from the dead to hunt him down. Andrew Goth’s ambitious and disaster beset feature (it started production is 2009) is a heady mix of Sergio Leone’s Spaghetti Westerns and Alejandro Jodorowsky’s mystical cult classic El Topo. Set in a vast foreboding desert, this ultimate cowboy zombie mash-up stars Wesley Snipes as a cursed gunfighter attempting to allude justice whilst killing the ‘undead’. Prepare for surreal true grit, a shock bonanza and a fistful of corpses.

programme.title: Shock and Awe
programme.desc: SHOCK AND AWE is a thought-provoking political thriller based on the shocking true events in the aftermath of 9/11. In the wake of the 9/11 terrorist attacks, a group of journalists working for Knight Ridder and covering George Bush's planned invasion of Iraq in 2003 are sceptical of the president's claim that Saddam Hussein was hiding weapons of mass destruction. Journalists Jonathan Landay (Woody Harrelson) and Warren Strobel (James Marsden) decide to play on very dangerous territory by challenging the White House.

programme.title: The Journey
programme.desc: After 40 years of "The Troubles" in Northern Ireland the leading players meet at St. Andrews to try and hammer out a final and lasting peace agreement. The success of the talks depend on loyalist firebrand Ian Paisley and a former IRA Commander Martin McGuinnness, two sworn enemies, agreeing to share power. With the talks in extreme crisis the pair are forced by circumstance, or perhaps fate, to take a car journey together. After a series of initial bitter exchanges, their conversation begins to shift and cracks emerge in their armour.

programme.title: Mail Order Monster
programme.desc: After witnessing her mother's death 3 years ago, 12-year-old Sam Pepper has never been able to move on. With her reclusive nature and place at the 'nerd table', Sam is an easy target for bullying, even from her former friend PJ. One day, when PJ humiliates her in front of all their classmates, Sam decides she's finally had enough. Her imagination is sparked by an ad in a comic book, offering to deliver all the parts you need to build your own 'Monster'. Finally, Sam is able to give PJ a taste of her own medicine. But just as her life takes a turn for the better, Sam's father reveals he's proposed to his girlfriend.

programme.title: Last Days In The Desert
programme.desc: Suffused with mystery, and set against breath-taking landscapes, this bold and dramatic interpretation of the temptations of Christ explores Jesus’ confrontation with the devil in his last days fasting Judean desert. Finally contemplating a return to civilisation, and his imminent death, Jesus happens upon a troubled family dealing with a much more earthly problem: the young son being desperate to leave the familial home against his father’s wishes, in search of the big city. Amid this family struggle we see Jesus wrestling not only with Satan, but also with his own faith.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: The year is 1845, the earliest days of the Oregon Trail, and a wagon team of three families has hired the mountain man Stephen Meek to guide them over the Cascade Mountains. Claiming to know a short cut, Meek leads the group on an unmarked path across the high plain desert, only to become lost in the dry rock and sage. Over the coming days, the emigrants must face the scourges of hunger, thirst and their own lack of faith in each other’s instincts for survival. When a Native American wanderer crosses their path, the emigrants are torn between their trust in a guide who has proven himself unreliable and a man who has always been seen as the natural enemy.

programme.title: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
programme.desc: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son - both committed by the Krugs, a race of animal warriors controlled by the evil Gallian

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard, Anti-Life) a New York City cop at rock bottom. But when he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together to save not only the life of the witness but his own as they are hunted across the city. The clock is ticking in this exhilarating race against time. Will justice be served or will there be two more bodies to add to the crime toll of the city?

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...

programme.title: Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi’s life is turned upside down when his younger brother is kidnapped from the streets of Victorian London. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, sinister strangers, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth – but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.
